View

Class MapSheet

  • java.lang.Object
    • View.MapSheet

  • public class MapSheet
extends java.lang.Object
    Sheet which holds a BufferedImage of all the possible panels for the minimap. Can get panels based on the type, as defined by exits.
    Author:
    Chris

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MapSheet()
      Constructs the MapSheet & stores Images/MapPanels as the sheet.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage getRoom(java.lang.String roomType)
      Takes a string corresponding to the locations of the exit in the room that should be displayed, in N>E>S>W order, and generates the BufferedImage of that room, clipped from the sheet.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • MapSheet

        public MapSheet()
        Constructs the MapSheet & stores Images/MapPanels as the sheet.

    • Method Detail

      • getRoom

        public java.awt.image.BufferedImage getRoom(java.lang.String roomType)
        Takes a string corresponding to the locations of the exit in the room that should be displayed, in N>E>S>W order, and generates the BufferedImage of that room, clipped from the sheet.
        Parameters:
        roomType - The type of room as a string containing the exits.
        Returns:
        The BufferedImage corresponding to roomType, or null if roomType is invalid.
